name: The Block Father
description:
The Block Father has to put his children to sleep, when every child is in their pillow you can pass to the next level! 

Game Developed for 12th Game Jam Univali and 1st Univali + XAMK with the theme "Assemble Disassemble (Monte Desmonte)".

Dev team:

  • Henrique A. Siebert: Sound Designer
  • Henrique Tsuneda Marin: Programmer
  • Gabriela Cristine:  2D and Concept Artist
  • José das Graças Martins Neto: Game Designer and Producer

Non-autoral assets used:

SoundTrap Sound Library 

How to Play:

 Touch the children blocks to attach then to the father block or another children block that is already attached. Put them back to sleep on their pillows that are distributed around the phase. 

Controls:

Movement:  "W" "A" "S" "D" or arrow keys

Restart: "R" 

Back to Menu: "ESC"
